name: 方圓
objective:
以網際網路為本，介紹電腦網路基本概念與企業實務運作，奠定網路架構基礎，並
說明資訊安全的重要性。
This course aims at teaching the basic, introductory networking topics as a firm
foundation with the latest advances in wireless networking and providing the
importance and ins and outs of information security as well.
scorePolicy:
平時：24%（兩次作業，各12%）
出席：6%
期中考：30%
期末考：40%
加分題：5%
materials:
Data Communications and Networking, 5E, Behrouz A. Forouzan,
McGraw-Hill, 2013.
Business Data Networks and Security, 10th Edition, Raymond R. Panko and
Julia L. Panko, 2015, Pearson.
Computer Networking : A Top-Down Approach, 7/e Keith Ross (author),
James Kurose (author)
